components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE
summary: WE HAVE NUMEROUS COMPLAINTS WITH THIS VEHICLE. ONE OF WHICH  IS THE BRAKES. ANOTHER IS THE COOLING SYSTEM.  THERE IS A RECALL ON THE MANIFOLD BUT OUR LOCAL FORD DEALER WLLL NOT REPLACE EVEN THOUGH WE HAVE ASKED THEM TO DO SO. IN ADDITION THE ENGINE HAD A PROBLEM WHICH NO ONE COULD FIGURE OUT.
